sqlMap.sql: SELECT a.ID, a.BB_ID, a.SMBO_ID, a.TITLE, a.TYP, a.CONTENT, a.CONT_PREVIEW, a.CONT_REPLY, a.CONT_REWARD, a.CONT_TOP, a.CONT_REC, a.CONT_GOOD, a.CONT_BAD, a.CONT_STATUS, a.REMARK, a.CREATE_USER_ID, a.CREATE_USER_NAME, a.CREATE_DATE, a.UPDATE_USER_ID, a.UPDATE_USER_NAME, a.UPDATE_DATE, a.DEL, b.PHOTO_PATH as imgPath, b.security_level as securityLevel, b.nice_name as niceName FROM bbs_posts a LEFT JOIN sys_user b on a.create_user_id=b.id WHERE a.del = 0 and b.del=0 AND a.cont_rec = 1 ORDER BY a.UPDATE_DATE DESC limit 10

SELECT a.ID, a.BB_ID, a.SMBO_ID, a.TITLE, a.TYP, a.CONTENT, a.CONT_PREVIEW, a.CONT_REPLY, a.CONT_REWARD, a.CONT_TOP, a.CONT_REC, a.CONT_GOOD, a.CONT_BAD, a.CONT_STATUS, a.REMARK, a.CREATE_USER_ID, a.CREATE_USER_NAME, a.CREATE_DATE, a.UPDATE_USER_ID, a.UPDATE_USER_NAME, a.UPDATE_DATE, a.DEL, b.PHOTO_PATH as imgPath, b.security_level as securityLevel, b.nice_name as niceName FROM bbs_posts a LEFT JOIN sys_user b on a.create_user_id=b.id WHERE a.del = 0 and b.del=0 AND a.typ = 5 ORDER BY a.UPDATE_DATE DESC limit 6

SELECT a.ID, a.BB_ID, a.SMBO_ID, a.TITLE, a.TYP, a.CONTENT, a.CONT_PREVIEW, a.CONT_REPLY, a.CONT_REWARD, a.CONT_TOP, a.CONT_REC, a.CONT_GOOD, a.CONT_BAD, a.CONT_STATUS, a.REMARK, a.CREATE_USER_ID, a.CREATE_USER_NAME, a.CREATE_DATE, a.UPDATE_USER_ID, a.UPDATE_USER_NAME, a.UPDATE_DATE, a.DEL, b.PHOTO_PATH as imgPath, b.security_level as securityLevel, b.nice_name as niceName, (select title from bbs_big_board where del=0 and id=a.bb_id limit 1) as bbName, (select title from bbs_small_board where del=0 and id=a.bb_id limit 1) as smboName FROM bbs_posts a LEFT JOIN sys_user b on a.create_user_id=b.id WHERE a.del = 0 and b.del=0 and a.id=:id

SELECT a.ID, a.BB_ID, a.SMBO_ID, a.TITLE, a.TYP, a.CONTENT, a.CONT_PREVIEW, a.CONT_REPLY, a.CONT_REWARD, a.CONT_TOP, a.CONT_REC, a.CONT_GOOD, a.CONT_BAD, a.CONT_STATUS, a.REMARK, a.CREATE_USER_ID, a.CREATE_USER_NAME, a.CREATE_DATE, a.UPDATE_USER_ID, a.UPDATE_USER_NAME, a.UPDATE_DATE, a.DEL, b.PHOTO_PATH as imgPath, b.security_level as securityLevel, b.nice_name as niceName, (select title from bbs_big_board where del=0 and id=a.bb_id limit 1) as bbName, (select title from bbs_small_board where del=0 and id=a.bb_id limit 1) as smboName FROM bbs_posts a LEFT JOIN sys_user b on a.create_user_id=b.id WHERE a.del = 0 and b.del=0 <#if id?exists && id!=""> AND a.smbo_id=:id </#if> ORDER BY a.UPDATE_DATE DESC
update bbs_posts set CONT_PREVIEW=cont_preview+1 where id=:id
